Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is able to quickly give me a concise review of my work and answer my questions as speficically or broadly as I want and I can do it at any time.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI helped feel more reassured about my understanding of the content whilst the teacher's feedback (if there was any) was very short and did little to assist.
